recommendations: Norma Escandon Michaels, ASID, NCIDQ, LEED Green Assoc.
Principal/Interior Architectural Designer, NM Interiors Group Inc.
July 30, 2015, Darcy was a client of Norma Escandon’s

I recently hired Norma to design my new office space. Not only did Norma’s design skills exceed my expectations, she also effortlessly led the project from start to finish with expertise and professionalism. I was especially impressed by Norma’s ability to manage the various details of the project – nothing was overlooked. She kept the project on schedule and it was completed in time for our grand opening reception. It was a pleasure working with Norma, and I highly recommend her and NM Interiors Group.
